coreAttributes.name: Billy's Best
coreAttributes.description: A small, circular package containing a very strong goat cheese. The branding on the top of the package declares it to be 'Billy's Best', while the label underneath shows a naked goat-boy, who you assume to be Billy, showing off his muscled body.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot healthier...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 2)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] the goat cheese out of its packaging and quickly [npc.verb(devour)] it, leaving [npc.herHim] with the strong, overpowering taste of tangy cheese filling [npc.her] mouth.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] the goat cheese out of its protective packaging, before bringing it up to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lips] and getting [npc2.herHim] to eat it. Quickly devouring it, [npc2.name] is left with the strong, overpowering taste of tangy cheese filling [npc2.her] mouth.
